author: David Canellis
title: This collaboration app startup is now worth $2B after its latest funding raise
description: Notion, a relatively small collaboration software start-up, just raised $50 million — an impressive feat during the coronavirus pandemic. This funding brings the total valuation of Notion to $2 billion, way up from its previously-valued $800 million, reports …
content:
Notion, a relatively small collaboration software start-up, just raised $50 million  an impressive feat during the coronavirus pandemic.
This funding brings the total valuation of Notion to $2 billion, way up from its previously-valued $800 million, reports … [+1167 chars]
